Yiye Jiang

I am a PhD student at Institut de Mathématiques de Bordeaux, under the supervision of Jérémie Bigot and Sofian Maabout. My research works lie in time series analysis with the graph emphasis. I am recently interested in modelling the distributional time series.

I am also interested in more general machine learning and sloving the problems motived by the real applications.

email github.com/yiyej
